description: alert fonts don't render, core never syncs

I started using Qortal a few months ago when it was released to the public after over 6 years of development and evolution from the Qora network. It's not just a cryptocurrency, it's a whole framework for an ecosystem of and evolved and decentralised Internet.

Qortal has several features already and more planned:

-Privacy cryptocurrency
-Decentralised crypto trading *
-Decentralised group and private messaging *
-Cloud storage **
-Web hosting **
-DApp capabilities **
and much more planned.

*in continuous development
**on the road map

Download the core (node) and UI now and support the community. The internet will change forever with this project :-)
summary: The New Decentralised Internet. Great project. Get it now!

description: Most people know not to use their real name as a username. That said this not traceable and actually pays you to use it rather than Devs having there hands out like the new BTC chat app. All chat text is gone and untracebale after 24 hrs, and new updates happen almost biweekly.
